amendment.description: To modify provisions relating to user fees, and for other purposes.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1049 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1049 proposed by Senator Brown for Senator Enzi. (consideration: CR S5699-5705) To modify provisions relating to user fees, and for other purposes.
